name: Planet Factory (mind-maker)
description:
The universe is requesting worlds and needs your factory! With a contract assigned, create a perfect match from your factory and test using a sample solar system. The universe will judge if the world can be accepted and will provide funds if so.

Complete three (3) matches to "win."

Submitted for VR Game Jam 2021. There may be bugs.

This was a solo project.

Assets were used from Unity Asset Store, OpenGameArt.org, and FreeSound.org
